projects.name: Aurelia
projects.description: Aurelia is a next generation JavaScript client framework that leverages simple conventions to empower your creativity.

projects.name: Ampersand
projects.description: A modern & loosely coupled non-frameworky framework for client-side apps.

projects.name: AngularJS
projects.description: HTML enhanced for web apps

projects.name: RiotJS
projects.description: A React- like, 3.5KB user interface library

projects.name: React
projects.description: A declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

projects.name: Cascade
projects.description: Although the overall look and feel are most definitely inspired by Twitter Bootstrap, Cascade framework is not just another Bootstrap clone. Where Twitter Bootstrap puts its focus on delivering shiny user elements that can be dropped into any project and takes control of your project's overall look-and-feel, Cascade Framework is intended to do the opposite.

projects.name: Bootstrap
projects.description: The most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web

projects.name: Alt
projects.description: Isomorphic flux implementation

projects.name: Flux
projects.description: Application architecture for building user interfaces

projects.name: Foundation
projects.description: The most advanced responsive  front-end framework in the world

projects.name: Fluxible
projects.description: "Build isomorphic Flux applications"

projects.name: McFly
projects.description: Flux architecture made easy

projects.name: Flummox
projects.description: Idiomatic, modular, testable, isomorphic Flux. No singletons required.

projects.name: Lux.js
projects.description: Flux-based architecture for using ReactJS at LeanKit

projects.name: Fluxxor
projects.description: Fluxxor is a set of tools to facilitate building JavaScript data layers using the Flux architecture by reifying many of the core Flux concepts. It works particularly well in conjunction with React as the view layer, and contains a few helpers to make integration with React applications easier.

projects.name: Reflux
projects.description: A simple library for uni-directional dataflow application architecture inspired by ReactJS Flux

projects.name: Delorean
projects.description: A completely agnostic JavaScript framework to apply Flux concepts into your interfaces easily.

projects.name: Marty
projects.description: A JavaScript library for state management in React applications

projects.name: Material-Flux
projects.description: No magic flux implementation library.

projects.name: Fynx
projects.description: Fynx (formerly known as Flox) is an architecture library for React loosely based on the Flux architecture and inspired by Reflux and Fluxxor.
